title: ICE: Region parameter out of range when substituting in region 'b (index=4)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-beta
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to beta.

labels.name: A-impl-trait
labels.description: Area: impl Trait. Universally / existentially quantified anonymous types with static dispatch.

body:
### Code reduced from `src/test/rustdoc/async-fn.rs` ```Rust trait Pattern<'a> {} async fn named_trait<'a, 'b>(foo: impl Pattern<'a>) -> impl Pattern<'b> {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.64.0-nightly (55f46419a 2022-08-05) binary: rustc commit-hash: 55f46419afd2e49acfc6be176ad4aeadaa5686d7 commit-date: 2022-08-05 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.64.0-nightly LLVM version: 14.0.6 ``` ### Error output `rustc ./async-fn.rs -Zsave-analysis --edition=2021 --crate-type lib` ``` ```
Backtrace
